name: Rediscover the Lost Ones
description:
This game was created within 72 hours for SA GAME JAM. 
I am a solo developer and am currently still a student.

 Things I did not create myself: 
 -Main menu song. Original creator (Alexander Nakarada) 
 -In-game song. (Kinda lost the creators name somehow)
-Unity Standard Assets
-Text Mesh Pro

 (All rights reserved for original creators)

This is kind of a preview of what could come to pass. (An open-world survival game with these and many more fantasy creatures in their respected habitats) 

F to pause in game.
Note: There are quite a bit of spelling mistakes and grammer issues. Sorry in advance.

In this game, your backstory is not explained, However at the start of the game some entity talks to you.
It tells you that you must protect these creatures who are on the verge of extinction.

Each container has a hologram of a creature. Your goal is to study them in order to prove your dedication to the entity. Otherwise, you will be rejected and the creatures destroyed.

In order to prove your dedication, you must answer all the questions correctly.

I hope you enjoy my little game.
